FuncDef:
The if-match interface command sets a filtering rule that is based on the outbound interface.
The undo if-match interface command cancels the configuration. The if-match interface command sets a filtering rule that is based on the outbound interface. The undo if-match interface command cancels the configuration. By default, no filtering rule based on the outbound interface is set.

Specifies the name of an interface.

ExtraInfo: To filter routes based on the outbound interface, run the if-match interface command.
